title: Selma To Montgomery National Historic Trail: Plan A Field Trip
body: Plan A Field Trip          Self-Guided  The Lowndes Interpretive Center and Selma Interpretive Center are designed to be self-guided and our award winning film "Never Lose Sight of Freedom" can be seen 9:30 AM - 3:30 PM.   Ranger-Led  There is no fee for our ranger-led programs; however, reservations are required. Walk-ins will be accepted, but we can't guarantee a ranger-led program without a prior reservation.   Call the Lowndes Interpretive Center at (334) 877-1983 or Selma Interpretive Center at (334) 872-0509 and make your reservation today!
